ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Avali Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic avali technologies, such as weapons printing. Although, it seems further research will be needed to do more useful tasks with them...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Tungsten Processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic Tungsten processing- you probably wont find much use for this resource right now, but tungsten is great later on.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nano-forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: One of the most important workbenches, this workbench is where tungsten can be processed and weapons made.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Traditional Avali Apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Traditional avali apparel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thermal Wraps
ResearchProjectDef.description: These wraps help keep your avali safe in the worst of temperatures. Works especially well if material is bad insulator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Common exploration gear
ResearchProjectDef.description: This gear is commonly found on explorers, helping them survive dangerous and unsafe locations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Combat armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: This armor is made for combat, featuring heavy protection at the cost of speed and weight. (SOS2 EVA compatible)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spec Ops armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: The avali spec ops armor is a high-end, top of the line avali armor, featuring the latest avali technologies and advances. (SOS2 EVA compatible)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Avali Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: A few basic weapons. Nothing too special about them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Avali Guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: The avali version of their human counterparts, these weapons are designed to be used at long range.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AIMS (Avali Intelligent Mortar System)
ResearchProjectDef.description: An advanced, more powerful mortar system. The AIMS mortar can fire shells designed for it, and has much better accuaracy than a regular mortar.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AERIAL System
ResearchProjectDef.description: A highly advanced automated mortar system, fully capable of automatically selecting targets and lauching projectiles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Avali turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: These railgun-based turrets are designed to be used at longer ranges then their human counterparts.
Slightly better than a "pokey stick", as some avali have called previous weapons, these are more likely to be less "pokey" and more "staby".
ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Avali Melee weapons
Nano-loom
ResearchProjectDef.description: Another important workbench, Avali use this for all their weaving needs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nano-carbon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nano-carbon, while mostly useless by itself, can be used with nanofiber to create better, stronger cloth-like materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanofibre
ResearchProjectDef.description: A key element in the creation of most avali cloth-like materials, nanofibre is a good resource to have on hand. It can be used with other materials to create better insulation, or more protective cloth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ferroweave
ResearchProjectDef.description: Aero weave is a very insulated cloth, making it perfect for assisting in surviving those hot conditions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Aero-Tungsten Carbide
ResearchProjectDef.description: Aero-Tungsten Carbide, a supermaterial mainly forged from both tungsten and carbon, with other materials mixed in to strengthen the mixture.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Aero-Tungsten Fiber
ResearchProjectDef.description: A strong cloth-like material, made from aero-tungsten carbide and nano carbon fiber.
